name: Gun Strike Blood Killer 3D
description:
Welcome to Gun Strike Blood Killer The First Person Shooting 3D Game 2017.

If you are looking for a full 3D Gun Strike shooting game with many different deadly weapons through the bullets with Tech Armor, M202, AWP, M1887 complete combat missions to annihilate deadly terrorists then you are in good luck and try this game now.

Locate blood killer enemies on the map and shoot. But be aware that the blood killer enemies are equipped with modern weapons also, you need to careful while Shooting. If your health is low then take cover and deal with them by hiding in corners. Blood killer enemies have attacked the city and destroying the peace of the region. Each enemy is well trained and contains deadly shooting weapon which can take your health down fast. Also check corners before shoot because the enemies are cowards and they take cover in corners so be careful about it. Reload your gun before shooting the enemy so that you are totally prepared for them. Moreover, when you shoot a blood killer enemies they will attack you also, so don’t expect a bot standing shooting, they are sharp and can change positions also. They might come from your back too.

Gun Strike Blood Killer is a totally free game with 6 different maps and more than 40 missions. And as you progress every mission get difficult and the number of blood killer enemies also increases with it shooting skills. Maps are unlocked when you complete all missions on a single map then you move on to the next one. Weapons are unlocked when you complete missions and with the new mission, new weapons also come. 

Almost all of the weapons are automatic so you don’t have to worry about semi auto guns or to tap for every shot. Also, we add a new feature in gun strike which makes your gaming experience more exciting, that is when you aim at a terrorist or enemigo than the gun fire automatically, you don’t have to tap to shoot, just aim well you will kill them in no time. Reloading of an empty magazine is already automatic. Controllers are well placed and balanced which will make it easier to aim and to kill the enemies manually. 

Become a blood killer commando, heroic blood killer and complete each mission with honor. Gun Strike Blood Killer Features:

✪ A full 3D game with amazing graphics shooting.
✪ 6 different maps to play on gun strike.
✪ 40+ missions to complete.
✪ Free FPS sniper shooting gameplay
✪ Best 3D FPS game
✪ 20 shooting weapons to unlock and to complete the missions.
✪ The totally realistic sound which increases gameplay experience.
✪ Blood killer enemies are easily located on the map to shoot.
✪ Smooth controller to move around enemigo.
✪ Auto fire when aim on enemies, you can also shoot manually.

Download Gun Strike Blood Killer to end the rule of terrorists in the area and bring peace to the region enemigo. Don’t forget to give your feedback and changes you want to see.
